title: Happy White Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Karin-senpaaai! Could you taste this for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>A taste test? What for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin’s special bread roll! A White Day special!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It looks very cute already. Why don’t you go give it to that girl?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No, no, no! It does look pretty cute and tasty, but Kasumin wants someone else to try it first......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Kasumi-chan, it’s strange for you to have no confidence. Don’t worry! You’re such a hard-working girl. Your efforts will pay off. I guarantee it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You can guarantee it even though you haven’t tasted it......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Of course. Kasumi-chan, have some confidence in yourself!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hmm...... Alright, Kasumin is gonna give it to her! But stay here because Kasumin will be back!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>To thank you for cheering Kasumin up, you’ll also get a special White Day bread roll! Ehehe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah, I’m looking forward to it. Okay, go on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
